FuncDef: The display segment-routing dynamic global-block command displays the range of dynamic global labels reserved for segment routing.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the range of dynamic global labels.
Only the scope of the label segment greater than or equal to rangecount is displayed.
The value is an integer ranging from 2 to 65535.

Examples: Segment Routing Dynamic Global Block Information
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the range of dynamic global labels reserved for segment routing, run the display segment-routing dynamic global-block command.
